dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 249 RH: To redesignate certain facilities at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in honor of Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Pallone (for himself, Ms. Pou, Mr. Norcross, Mr. Van Drew, Mr. Conaway, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Gottheimer, Mr. Kean, Mr. Menendez, Mrs. McIver, Ms. Sherrill, and Mrs. Watson Coleman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To redesignate certain facilities at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in honor of Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr.

section.header: Redesignation of Paterson Great Falls NHP facilities

subsection.header: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge
subsection.text: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park shall hereafter be known and designated as Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge.
Overlook Park at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park shall hereafter be known and designated as Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park.
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to—

paragraph.text: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge shall be deemed to be a reference to Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge; and
Overlook Park shall be deemed to be a reference to Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
